original_text: Some of them were in charge of the articles used in the temple service; they counted them when they were brought in and when they were taken out.
korean_text: 그 중에 어떤 자는 섬기는 데 쓰는 기구를 맡아서 그 수효대로 들여가고 수효대로 내오며

sentences.original_text: Some of them were in charge
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 사람들은 책임을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: of the articles used in the temple service
they counted them when they were brought in
and when they were taken out
